name: Wedging
description: Kneading clay to prepare it and remove air pockets.

name: Ball Kneading
description: Kneading the clay with both hands before placing on the wheel.

name: Pinching
description: Compressing and thinning clay by pinching with fingers.

name: Palm Rolling
description: Rolling small spheres or shapes with the palm of the hand.

name: Smoothing
description: Refining surfaces by running fingers or tools across clay.
